name: Espresso
description: A strong and aromatic coffee with a rich flavor and a velvety crema. Served in a small cup, it's the perfect shot of energy. Ideal for those who appreciate bold taste and a true coffee experience.

name: Caff√® Americano
description: Americano is a popular coffee drink made by diluting a shot of espresso with hot water. It has a smooth, rich flavor and a lighter strength compared to straight espresso. Perfect for those who enjoy the taste of espresso but prefer a milder brew.

name: Cappuccino
description: Cappuccino is a classic Italian coffee made with equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam. It has a rich, bold flavor balanced by the creamy texture of the milk. Often enjoyed in the morning, it's a perfect blend of strength and smoothness.

name: Filter Coffee
description: Filter coffee is a brewed coffee made by pouring hot water over ground coffee, allowing it to slowly drip through a filter. It has a clean, smooth taste that highlights the natural flavors of the beans. This method is popular for its simplicity and ability to bring out subtle aromas.

name: Cold Brew Latte
description: Cold Brew Latte is a refreshing coffee drink made by mixing cold brew concentrate with milk, served over ice. It has a smooth, mellow flavor with low acidity and a creamy finish. Perfect for warm days, it offers a cool twist on traditional coffee.
